data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guglielmino, Adalgisa, Olmi, Massimo (2014): Revision of the Afrotropical species of Gonatopus group 3 (Hymenoptera: Dryinidae), with description of a new species from Ghana. Zootaxa 3802 (1): 35-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3802.1.3
